se.caplogic.mappedbus

Class MappedBusReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.caplogic.mappedbus.MappedBusReader

  • public class MappedBusReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for reading from the MappedBus.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long MAX_TIMEOUT_COUNT

      Constructors

      MappedBusReader(java.lang.String fileName, long fileSize, int recordSize)
      Creates a new reader.

    • Field Detail

      • MAX_TIMEOUT_COUNT

        public static final long MAX_TIMEOUT_COUNT
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • MappedBusReader

        public MappedBusReader(java.lang.String fileName,
                       long fileSize,
                       int recordSize)
        Creates a new reader.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the memory mapped file
        fileSize - the maximum size of the file
        recordSize - the maximum size of a record (excluding status flags and meta data)

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public void open()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Opens the reader.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was a problem opening the file

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(int timeout)
        Sets the time for a reader to wait for a record to be committed. When the timeout occurs the reader will mark the record as "rolled back" and the record is ignored.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout in milliseconds

      • next

        public boolean next()
             throws java.io.EOFException
        Steps forward to the next record if there's one available. The method has a timeout for how long it will wait for the commit field to be set. When the timeout is reached it will set the roll back field and skip over the record.
        Returns:
        true, if there's a new record available, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.io.EOFException - in case the end of the file was reached

      • readType

        public int readType()
        Reads the message type.
        Returns:
        the message type

      • readMessage

        public Message readMessage(Message message)
        Reads the next message.
        Parameters:
        message - the message object to populate
        Returns:
        the message object

      • readBuffer

        public int readBuffer(byte[] dst,
                      int offset)
        Reads the next buffer of data.
        Parameters:
        dst - the input buffer
        offset - the offset in the buffer of the first byte to read data into
        Returns:
        the length of the record that was read

      • hasRecovered

        public boolean hasRecovered()
        Indicates whether all records available when the reader was created have been read.
        Returns:
        true, if all records available from the start was read, otherwise false

      • close

        public void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Closes the reader.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there was an error closing the file
